title: Yulia Lopatina
text:
I am an experienced Data Analyst with over 10 years in finance and operations within a multinational environment, backed by a solid academic foundation in Business Analytics from the University of Bath (UK), focused on generating and applying data insights across diverse business contexts. I have a proven track record of delivering data-driven solutions that enhance business performance.
Passionate about data, I develop analytical solutions that turn complex data into clear, actionable insights, whether for a personal problem, such as creating a workout-tracker dashboard to support decision-making on workload and performance optimisation, or in a professional context, where I synthesise complex data to identify key drivers, anomalies, and patterns in operational and financial performance. My experience includes time-series forecasting, machine learning, NLP, regression analysis, clustering, simulation, optimisation, and data visualisation.
My tech stack includes Python (pandas, numpy, seaborn, matplotlib, statsmodels, sklearn, transformers), R (tidyverse, dplyr, ggplot2), SQL, Excel (VBA, Power Query, Data Analysis, Solver), Markdown, Git, IBM Cognos Analytics, SAP Business Objects, Power BI, and Tableau.
